kpi_info.title: Ingress CLP0 cells discarded
kpi_info.use: Total ingress CLP0 cells discarded because of thresholding. This counter tells how many high priority cells buffer management has discarded on ingress. When the buffer fill level exceeds the CLP0+1 threshold, no cells are accepted to the buffer. Both CLP0 and CLP1 cells are discarded. Discarded CLP1 cells are counted in counter I_CLP1_DROP M528C2. CLP0+1 thresholding parameters are fixed by the system.
